channel.title: Tough Mudder
channel.description:
Is anyone taking part in this years tough mudder events? I switched from my regular training routine to a new routine yesterday primarily for this and I'm feeling the burn big time. My dad and brother both completed it last year and we're all going to try for it this year. I'm hoping to qualify for the worlds toughest mudder but that's going to take some serious effort.
For those of you who don't know, tough mudder is more or less a 13mile~ long obstacle course which entails ice baths, massive walls, half pipes to run up, being electrocuted and the list goes on and on. All funds raised go towards help for heroes and various other charities like that one, it's a pretty fun day out and you always have bragging rights that you completed the tough mudder course.
So yeah, anyone?

item.title: Tough Mudder
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

casey.:

are you looking to be cool or something cause i doubt anyone here is even in shape enough to run more than a few miles

Tbh you just made yourself look like an ass rofl.

OT: No, unfortunately the idea of being electrocuted and ice bathed doesn’t sound like my cup of tea. That and I just started working out so… :p. Good luck though, be sure to let us know how well you did!

Read full topic

item.title: Tough Mudder
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

the elve age:

What the hell, why would you want to do this?

It’s a challenge and it’s something to aim for I suppose. It’s a big deal around here, especially in and around gyms. Plus, sheer bragging rights lol.[quote=“Frell, post:10, topic:490959”]bro you’ll have to drag my ass through a mile of glass before I even consider doing cardio let alone this[/quote]
rofl. I actually enjoy cardio, if I need to clear my head I’d happily go for a run etc. This is apparently not all that bad because you only run for 2/3/4 miles at a time before waiting in a line for an obstacle so it’s not constant. Ice bath is the first obstacle too which is a pain in the cunt because all of your clothes are wet, you’re freezing cold and you just feel horrible. It’ll be an experience if nothing else.

Read full topic
